CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 18, 1960, pg .5 reads: "1. The enthusiasm of the huge throngs each night made the show a smash hit from beginning to end. Decorative displays, top-flight entertainment nad expert food and home furnishings reigned supreme"
TitMainTitle: Crowd in Syria Mosque with Natural Gas Companies Modern Gas Appliances booth on right for the 1960 Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama
